p.a: Our virtual book fair begins on Monday, April 13th! This fair is for PreK to 12th grade students! Look for more information via email. Our school earns Scholastic Dollars to purchase books for classroom teachers and our library.https://bookfairs.scholastic.com/bookfairs/cptoolkit/homepage.do?method=homepage&url=edinburgelementaryschool1

a.aria-label: Read more about Scholastic Vitrual Book Fair

img.alt: Image result for Don't send them to school if sick

p.span: Student absences, especially at the elementary level, is steadily becoming a concern as the number of absences continue to rise. The illnesses are not just one virus, but a combination of a variety of symptoms and confirmed cases of strep, and influenza A and B.

We are urging parents to keep their children home if they are sick, have a temperature above 99.5 degrees, experience flu-like symptoms, complain of body and/or head aches, or have severe sinus congestion. If your child has a fever today, please don't send them to school tomorrow. If you have to give your child Tylenol to get through the day, please don't send them to school. If they experience vomiting, diarrhea, or severe sinus congestion today, please don't send them to school tomorrow.
We are working with our teachers, students and custodians to wage war against these germs in our building.
We ask that parents monitor all symptoms. We will continually disinfect our building and monitor student attendance throughout the coming weeks.

div.em: Current conditions as of 24 Apr 07:15 am CDT

div.span: A chance of showers, with thunderstorms also possible after 4pm. Widespread dense fog, mainly before 9am. Otherwise, mostly cloudy, with a high near 68. Calm wind becoming south 5 to 8 mph in the afternoon. Chance of precipitation is 50%.

Showers likely and possibly a thunderstorm. Cloudy, with a low around 52. South southeast wind 5 to 8 mph becoming east after midnight. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.
Showers. High near 57. North wind 9 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New precipitation amounts between three quarters and one inch possible.
